title: Understand as-is user behaviours
subHeader: Understand user behaviours relating to energy use, travel etc in the as-is.

guidance.guidanceText01: Building an understanding of current user behaviours (in the 'as-is') allows designers to gain a sense of how these will be impacted by the new/revised service, and also allows calculations of carbon footprint that can form a baseline that the footprint of new service can be measured against.
